description: A mysterious Resonator with the power to absorb all sounds. Currently journeying to find their lost memories.
quote: Is this the beginning of a new journey? Brimming with novel sounds, and untold stories...

resonanceChain.name: Cryptic Insight
resonanceChain.description: Resonance Skill DMG Bonus is increased by {0}.

resonanceChain.name: Waning Crescent
resonanceChain.description: Reset Resonance Skill's Cooldown when Rover enters the Dark Surge state by casting Heavy Attack Devastation.

resonanceChain.name: Surging Resonance
resonanceChain.description: In the Dark Surge state, Basic Attack V restores HP equal to {0} of total HP lost on hit.

resonanceChain.name: Annihilated Silence
resonanceChain.description: Heavy Attack Devastation and Resonance Liberation Deadening Abyss reduces enemy Havoc RES by {0} for {1}s on hit.

resonanceChain.name: Aeon Symphony
resonanceChain.description: In the Dark Surge state, Basic Attack V deals an additional Havoc damage equal to {0} of Basic Attack V damage.

resonanceChain.name: Ebbing Undercurrent
resonanceChain.description: In the Dark Surge state, Rover's Crit. Rate is increased by {0}.

skills.name: Tuneslayer
skills.description: Basic Attack Rover-Havoc performs up to 5 consecutive attacks, dealing Havoc DMG. Heavy Attack Rover-Havoc consumes Stamina to attack, dealing Havoc DMG. Use Basic Attack after casting Heavy Attack to cast Basic Attack 4. Mid-air Attack Rover-Havoc consumes Stamina to cast a Mid-Air Plunging Attack, dealing Havoc DMG. Dodge Counter Use Basic Attack after a successful Dodge to attack the target, dealing Havoc DMG.

skills.name: Wingblade
skills.description: Transforms sound into feathers, dealing Havoc DMG.

skills.name: Deadening Abyss
skills.description: Rover gathers resonating sounds to attack a target, dealing Havoc DMG.

skills.name: Metamorph
skills.description: In the Dark Surge state, Havoc DMG Bonus is increased by 20%.

skills.name: Bleak Crescendo
skills.description: While in the Dark Surge state, Basic Attack recovers 1 Resonance Energy when it hits a target, and this effect can be triggered once per second.

skills.name: Instant of Annihilation
skills.description: Attack the target, dealing Havoc DMG.

skills.name: Umbra Eclipse
skills.description: Devastation When "Umbra" is full, hold Basic Attack to cast Devastation to attack the target, dealing Havoc DMG, considered as Heavy Attack damage. Dark Surge After casting Devastation, Rover enters the Dark Surge state. In this state: Basic Attack is replaced with Enhanced Basic Attack, which performs up to 5 consecutive attacks, dealing Havoc DMG; Heavy Attack is replaced with Enhanced Heavy Attack; Use Basic Attack after casting Enhanced Heavy Attack to cast Heavy Attack Thwackblade to attack the target, dealing Havoc DMG, considered as Heavy Attack damage; Use Basic Attack after casting Heavy Attack Thwackblade to cast Enhanced Basic Attack 3 to attack the target, dealing Havoc DMG; Resonance Skill Wingblade is replaced with Resonance Skill Lifetaker, transforming sounds into blades to attack the target, dealing Havoc DMG. Umbra Rover can hold up to 100 points of Umbra. Normal Attack Tuneslayer recovers Umbra on hit. Resonance Skill Wingblade recovers Umbra when cast. Resonance Skill Lifetaker recovers Umbra when cast. Intro Skill Instant of Annihilation recovers Umbra when cast.

skills.name: Soundweaver
skills.description: Rover summons a Havoc Field, dealing 143.3% Havoc DMG to all targets within range every 2s for 6s.
